vsParam:
Wilbell, good job!
So you chose the Wizardology class, huh?

Yes... I was so nervous during the class.
I dared not relax for a moment!

I didn't expect to experience such
a strong heartbeat in this world.

Uh, wasn't it Majorum Sensei's lesson?
Why are you nervous?
What do you think? Majorum Sensei, of course!

Uh uh!?
I think it's hard to get nervous in front of Majorum Sensei...

Hehehehe... Don't fall for it.
Those seemingly gentle and kind people are the most scary!

It can't be! At least not for Majorum Sensei.
She's not like that!

That's right. She's too kind to students,
and that makes us worry about her.

Actually... She resembles my grandmother,
that's why I can't help to get nervous.

My grandmother is the most powerful witch. She is a very
gentle and beautiful women, and also my role model...

But when she gets angry... It's,
extremely~~ horrible!
Majorum Sensei is really gentle and kind.
Majorum Sensei is different from your grandmother!

Hmm, if you guys believe so,
perhaps she's different...
Er... Of course I know that!

But I can't help to get scared!
My intuition tells me that she fakes her gentleness!

Hehe. I see.
Why don't we test it?

Test?
That's right! We could do that!

I am going to tear down Majorum Sensei's
mask of gentleness, and expose her nature!

I need to make some items first!
You guys will help, won't you?

Uh, sure we can help... But Sorel, it this really a good idea?
Wilbell seems very motivated?

Hehe. She'd only believe us when we
show her the facts♪

Why are you in a daze!
Go collect materials!

Hehehe... It's done!
I can now reveal the true colors of Majorum Sensei!

I mean, although we blindly helped you...
This thing is still not right, don't you think so?

Yeah... We shouldn't go test Majorum Sensei,
no matter how gentle she is...

It's alright, just wait and see!
I'll show you that teacher's real nature!
I think... we will be able to see her true personality, huh?
As long as Wilbell is happy...

That's right!
She's definitely a horrible teacher!

Gee. [px] and you guys,
you really do trust that teacher.

Er... Simply put, it can detect lies.
No matter how gentle she appears, it can show her heart.
I think her gentleness should come from the heart...

You are so naive! A witch can have several faces!
Hehe... Sensei, wait and see!

Yo, Wilbell!
I am so happy to see you!

Er... I am here to express my gratitude for your caring,
this is a small gift for you...

Wow, isn't it a magical lie detector!
Bravo, Wilbell, it's amazing for you to make such an item!

I, I am sorry!
Don't be... angry——

This thing is wonderful!
I didn't realize that you are so excellent!

Of course! You come here to show me
such a wonderful item... I am so happy!

Hmm? Why would I be angry when my student
show me an excellent work?
But I am not a regular student here...

Ho-ho. Every kid coming to my lesson
is my precious student♪

Wow!? It's... uncomfortable...
Sensei, don't hug me so tight...

Hehe, don't be shy.
... I mean, Wilbell.

Next time show me your really capability,
instead of such a prank, ok?

With this item alone, I can see that you possess
remarkable talent, I expect great things from you!

*Boo-hoo*... Actually, er...
I think I misjudged you, Sensei.

See? The best method is to confirm it in person, right?
And that's Majorum Sensei we are talking about,
you have nothing to worry about.

Ah ha ha. If it were Bergamot Sensei,
you'd be punished...

*Sob sob*, spare me, please!
But, I really didn't expect to meet such a kind teacher.

Majorum Sensei is... so kind and considerate,
and she smells good too...
